verseObjects.content: + \fr 18:11 \ft  Some later manuscripts add, For the Son of Mana has come to save the lost.

verseObjects.text: But do not allow yourselves to be called ‘Rabbi,’ for you have only one teacher, and you yourselves are all [neut:brothers and sisters.|masc:brothers.]

verseObjects.content: + \fr 23:14 \ft  Some later manuscripts add: Alas for you teachers of the law and Pharisees, hypocrites! You devour widows' property, and pray long prayers just for show! This is why you will receive a more severe punishment.

verseObjects.text: But the rest said, “Wait and let us see if Elijah is coming to save him.”

verseObjects.content: + \fr 27:49 \ft  Some later manuscripts add: However another man took a spear, and pierced his side; and water and blood flowed from it.
+ \ft Some modern versions have \fqa and in the ruins of the rich, lambs will graze \fqb .
